name: TrustHabResidents
0:
”Alexa, set the AC to seventy-five.”
”Alexa, lock the front door.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use this Skill to control all of your connected devices with just your voice and your Amazon Alexa device! Using this Skill requires a TrustHab Residents account and residency in a location with smart-home devices that are powered by TrustHab. Control your smart-home through your Alexa devices and speakers! Control your Thermostats, Outlets, Light Switches, Dimmers, and Locks with your voice!
Alexa, change the temperature to 75!
Alexa, lock the door!
Alexa, turn the front light off!
Devices in your living unit are already configured to your TrustHab Residents account, so once you activate this Skill, you will be able to start controlling these devices immediately!
